idea-plugin.name: XFTP
idea-plugin.description:
A SFTP tool for remote file management using SSH Configurations.

Features

  • Upload and download files with drag and drop.
  • Edit remote text file by double clicking.

Viewport Explain

  • The left list displays local files, current project directory is displayed by default.
  • The right list displays remote files.
  • The dropdown above every list is the path of its own, and it memorizes access history. And it accepts keyboard type-in to display files or open file.

Usage Instructions

  • The "Refresh" icon button on the left side is for refreshing local file list.
  • The "Open Folder" icon button on the left side is for displaying current local folder in system file manager, like Finder on MacOS and Explorer on Windows.
  • ------------------------------
  • Click the top-right "Server" icon button of the right list to select a server, if there is none, it can be managed in Preferences | Tools | SSH Configurations.
  • After connected to a server, the ssh user's home folder will be displayed in the right list.
    • The "Suspend" icon button is for disconnecting.
    • The "Terminal" icon button is for opening a new ssh terminal with current remote directory, like Tools | Start SSH Session.
    • The row with empty "size" cell is a directory.
    • Double click the file in the right list, if it is editable, it will be opened in IDE text editor, and the temporary file will be uploaded after it saved.
    • Dropping files at the right list will upload them to current remote folder.
    • Dropping remote files at the left list will download them to current local folder.
  • Disconnect or close tab while transferring files will cancel the transfer.

More information at Github.
